headline: Tyson Foods Dividend Decision Tested By Weaker Earnings And Margin Pressures
summary: Tyson Foods' board has approved a quarterly dividend for shareholders. The dividend decision reflects an update to the company’s capital allocation plans. This move is relevant for current and potential investors tracking income and capital return policies. Tyson Foods (NYSE:TSN) is drawing fresh attention after its board signed off on a new quarterly dividend. This puts a spotlight on how the company is currently handling shareholder returns. With the stock at $65.26 and a value score of...
